A4.text: The phrase 'under God' was incorporated into the Pledge of Allegiance on June 14, 1954, by a Joint Resolution of Congress amending ยง 4 of the Flag Code enacted in 1942.

A5.text: The most recent alteration of its wording came on Flag Day (June 14) in 1954, when the words 'under God' were added.
